Articles.Content:
So a while ago, i had this idea to make this video of me playing KSP with this epic space music. Here it is; what do you guys think? What do you think is the best KSP space music?

Note how well i tried to time the game events to changes in the music tempo

I really like it, and you indeed did match the music up nicely. Loved the song too!

For me, one of the things I think that would fit a KSP cinematic (or just general gameplay) is this:
The music is pretty good, but out of curiosity, how old is that video, by the looks of the UI it seems to be in version .23 or something.

The music is pretty good, but out of curiosity, how old is that video, by the looks of the UI it seems to be in version .23 or something.

Yeah, its old. Something around 0.23. The aerodynamics is original stock aero too. Or else, there is no way i would slow down from 11 km/s

- - - Updated - - -

I really like it, and you indeed did match the music up nicely. Loved the song too!

For me, one of the things I think that would fit a KSP cinematic (or just general gameplay) is this:

Thanks! Yeah, some classical would work well too.

So a while ago, i had this idea to make this video of me playing KSP with this epic space music. Here it is; what do you guys think? What do you think is the best KSP space music?

Note how well i tried to time the game events to changes in the music tempo

Nice! I really like the music, where is it from?

JR

Nice choices above. I know I've mentioned this in at least one other music thread here, but take a listen at this site. Space music by a real space scientist and a gamer!

http://themarathonmusic.com/about.html
Thread moved to the sub for player-made vids.
